# AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.standard

**Case**

A mode that processes microphone audio with standard voice DSP.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Microphone modes

- **AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.wideSpectrum**: A mode that minimizes microphone audio processing to capture all sounds in the room.
- **AVCaptureDevice.MicrophoneMode.voiceIsolation**: A mode that processes microphone audio to isolate the voice and attenuate other signals.
